name: Headbanging Hero: Metal
description:
Programming Me

Artist FuNaNdMoRe (http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/562900)

The origins of this game comes from a Game Jam where we have to made a game in three days, we got a daily award in Newgrounds and we wanted to make a really nice full version with the corrections that people asked and more songs and even an adventure mode!

Here you got a link to the first version: http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/567705

As you can see, we added LOADS of new features that you will find of players that asked us for them.

Some of the new features are:

- More songs

- Right time to press the key alert

- More characters

- Adventure Mode

- Song medals

Now, this is only what users asked for, we had added a better HUD, a new menu, an intro video to the game and even more!

General information about the game:

- 14 Songs

- 7 Stages in Adventure mode

- 6 Characters in total

We hope you have fun with it and get ALL the highscores and medals!
